sentences.en: Accordingly, it was pretty gruffly that the doctor answered him.
sentences.cn: 因此, 大夫回答他时一点也不客气.

sentences.en: Accordingly, she arose early Monday morning and dressed herself carefully.
sentences.cn: 为此, 星期一早上她早早起来,细细地穿着打扮了一番.

sentences.en: Accordingly, the crowd was sombre and grave.
sentences.cn: 因之, 人群也显出相应的阴郁和庄重.

sentences.en: Accordingly, when he arrived, he was disappointed to find Carrie out.
sentences.cn: 因此他来时, 看到嘉莉不在家,感到很失望.

sentences.en: As the economy develops, the living conditions of the people have been improved accordingly.
sentences.cn: 经济发展了, 人民的生活水平也随着提高了.

sentences.en: Children are sensitive to disapproval and adjust their behaviour accordingly.
sentences.cn: 孩子们对批评十分敏感,并会相应地调整自己的行为.

sentences.en: He laughed accordingly at the idea of Mr. Arabin's modesty.
sentences.cn: 他想到阿拉宾先生的谦虚谨慎,就觉得好笑.

sentences.en: He was told to speak briefly; accordingly he cut short his remarks.
sentences.cn: 人家叫他说话简短, 于是他就长话短说了.

sentences.en: Hope you will obey and do accordingly.
It is a difficult job and they should be paid accordingly.
sentences.cn: 这是份棘手的工作，他们应得到相应的报酬。

sentences.en: Katherine still considered him a child and treated him accordingly.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳仍旧把他当作小孩子，像对待小孩子一样对他。

sentences.en: Please inform us of your decision and we will act accordingly.
sentences.cn: 请把你们的决定通知我们,我们会照着去办的.

sentences.en: She complained of stiffness in her joints. Accordingly she was admitted to hospital for further tests.
sentences.cn: 她诉说自己的关节不灵活, 于是被留院作进一步检查.

sentences.en: Some of the laws were contradictory. Accordingly, measures were taken to clarify them.
sentences.cn: 有些法律相互矛盾，因此，采取了措施将其阐明。

sentences.en: They realised that some of their prices were higher than their competitors' and revised prices accordingly.
sentences.cn: 他们意识到自己有些价格高于竞争对手，就相应调整了价格。

sentences.en: Watch out for sharp bends and adjust your speed accordingly.
sentences.cn: 当心急转弯并相应调整车速。

sentences.en: We have to discover his plans and act accordingly.
sentences.cn: 我们得找出他的计划，照着办。
